item.title: Pope Leo taps Bishop Ronald Hicks to succeed Cardinal Dolan
item.description: Pope Leo XIV has named Bishop Ronald Hicks of Joliet, Illinois, to succeed retiring Timothy Cardinal Dolan as archbishop of New York.

item.title: Trump Media to merge with fusion energy company TAE in $6 billion deal
item.description: President Trump's media company is joining forces with a company working to commercialize fusion energy.

item.title: An early look at our town hall and debate series, launching in 2026
item.description: "Things That Matter," a series of planned town halls and debates sponsored by Bank of America, will launch early next year.

item.title: China fumes as White House announces record $10B in arms sales to Taiwan
item.description: The Trump administration's announcement of plan to sell Taiwan a record $10 billion worth of weapons draws an angry response from China.

item.title: CBS News and The Free Press launch town hall and debate series
item.description: "Things That Matter," a series of planned town halls and debates sponsored by Bank of America, will launch early next year.
